content: lion brand pattern # 70356ad skill level easy + level 3 vanna s choice® article #860 4 colors 13 balls total *taupe linen honey rust* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge strip = 4 in 10 cm wide work 11 strips 3 different versions are provided in half_double_crochet u s some sections are solid color others incorporate intarsia mini blocks within solid color background arrange strips as described in written pattern sew together along long edges crochet edging to finish
